contents.sentence: Was a DMF submitted in a format acceptable to the Engineer one week prior to use?
To ensure that the DMF meets the requirements in advance.
Confirm that the DMF that includes the following information related to the mixture design was submitted to the Engineer one week prior to use

:
• Producer (Contractor)
• Plant Location
• Material Identification/Sources-PG binder, coarse and fine aggregates
• DMF number
• Applicable ESAL Categories
• Mixture Course and Nominal Aggregate Designation
• Gradation Information
• Specific Gravity
• Lab and Plant Mixture Temperatures
• Reclaimed Asphalt Pavement (RAP)/Reclaimed Asphalt Shingles (RAS) Content
• Volumetric Properties
• Mixture Adjustment Factor, MAF
• Other Miscellaneous Design Information.
District Materials and Tests (DMT) personnel are a resource to answer questions regarding DMFs.
